title: [等到心淡] Ace Combat 7終於出release date無人講?

replies.msg:
https://www.facebook.com/AceCombat/videos/332578097312265/?tn-str=k*F

Prepare to return to the skies of Strangreal! We are excited to bring you a brand new ACE COMBAT 7 trailer! Are you ready to fly behind enemy lines?

ACE COMBAT 7: SKIES UNKNOWN lands on PS4, PSVR, and Xbox One on January 18th, 2019 and arrives on Steam February 1st 2019.

個個真係等到心都淡晒
最後都要推到2019先出到
